price: 65. Si quisiéramos, haríamos que se secaran, y lamentarían lo sucedido sorprendidos.
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
